materials: Construction Materials (Reuse); Drywall; Large Household Appliances; Lawn Equipment; Roofing Materials; Miscellaneous Tools; Small Appliances; Air Conditioners; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The ReStore raises funds by selling donated home improvement merchandise and uses all proceeds to build more homes. Habitat also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This helps raise the standards of housing. By recycling goods that would have been sent to a landfill, the ReStore also helps reduce waste disposal costs. If you have materials to donate, please call for more information. The Habitat ReStore accepts most home improvement materials and items.
